name: Snapmaker A350 (0.2 nozzle)
before_layer_change_gcode:
; Before Layer Change >>>
; ----- layer_num: [layer_num]
G92 E0
; <<< Before Layer Change
machine_start_gcode:
;Start GCode begin
;***** update: 20230131
;M593 P1 F40
M140 S[first_layer_bed_temperature]   ;Start warming Bed
;M104 S140 ; -Allow the bed enough time to thermally deform

G28 ; home all axes
G1 Z40.0 F2500

M190 S[first_layer_bed_temperature]   ;Wait For Bed Temperature
M109 S[first_layer_temperature] ;Wait for Hotend Temperature

;M593 P1 F50
{if 1==1}
G1 X-10 Y-10 F3000
G1 Z0 F1800
G92 E0
G1 E20 F200
G0 X0 Y0 F3000 ;Move to origin
G0 Z1 F1800 ;Move up to avoid scraping against heated bed
G92 E0
{endif}
;End GCode begin
machine_end_gcode:
;End GCode begin
;***** update: 20230131
G92 E0
G1 E-5 ;Retract the filament a bit before lifting the nozzle, to release some of the pressure
G92 E0
M104 S0 ;Extruder heater off
M140 S0 ;Heated bed heater off
G1 Z330 F9000
G1 X160 Y300 F9000
M107 ;fan off
M220 S100 ;reset feedrate
M82       ;reset absolute extrusion mode
M84       ;disable motors

;End GCode end
;
; DON'T REMOVE these lines if you're using the smfix (https://github.com/macdylan/Snapmaker2Slic3rPostProcessor)
; min_x = [first_layer_print_min_0]
; min_y = [first_layer_print_min_1]
; max_x = [first_layer_print_max_0]
; max_y = [first_layer_print_max_1]
; max_z = [max_layer_z]
;
